meanings.definition: A person who believes in hylozoism, the philosophical doctrine that all matter is alive.
meanings.sent1: The hylozoist thought that even rocks and rivers had their own form of life.
meanings.sent2: As a hylozoist, she saw the world as a living, breathing entity.
meanings.sent3: The hylozoist joked that even their toaster might be alive according to their beliefs.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the hylozoist, the entire universe was a grand symphony of life.
meanings.sent5: The hylozoist's perspective made every tree and blade of grass seem like a conscious being.

meanings.sent1: The hylozoist philosophy emphasized the interconnectedness of all things.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork was inspired by the hylozoist idea that everything possesses a life force.
meanings.sent3: The hylozoist approach to gardening involved talking to plants to help them grow.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with a hylozoist energy that seemed to pulse with vitality.
meanings.sent5: The hylozoist perspective painted the world in vibrant, living colors.
